snippet: It's likely that Jon M. Huntsman Jr. is the only candidate with whom New Hampshire voters have conversed in Chinese.
abstract: It's likely that Jon M. Huntsman Jr. is the only candidate with whom New Hampshire voters have conversed in Chinese.
lead_paragraph: HENNIKER, N.H. - Untold numbers of New Hampshire voters have tried to get a few words with the Republican presidential candidates barnstorming their state. But it's likely that Jon M. Huntsman Jr. is the only one with whom some have conversed in Chinese.

headline.main: For Huntsman, Mandarin Proves a Draw
